Appeals to the Hesitant 

                     (R. & H., May 27, 1902) C. H. 578, 579 
     37. The failure to follow sound principles has marred the history of God's people. There has been a continual backsliding in health reform, and as a result God is dishonored by a great lack of spirituality. Barriers have been erected which would never have been seen had God's people walked in the light.
